attributes.action: Change the Age of Consent in Northern Ireland to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The age of consent in Northern Ireland is 17 for heterosexual and homosexual sex, while in the other 3 main jurisdictions of the United Kingdom it is 16. The undersigned wish to promote equality and the change of the law in Northern Ireland to reflect that of the rest of the UK
